title: Types of taxes to reduce inequality

content.question: A society that wishes to achieve greater income equality is most likely to have which of the following?

choices.label: A regressive income tax system and high estate and gift taxes
A regressive income tax system and low estate and gift taxes
A progressive income tax system and high estate and gift taxes
A progressive income tax system and low estate and gift taxes
A proportional income tax system and high estate and gift taxes

content.answer: A progressive income tax system and high estate and gift taxes
